content.text:
I'm starting to realize that I may not actually need as much furniture as I have in my apartment. Here's what's currently here:

- two bar stools
- a couch
- a reading chair
- a desk chair
- a bed
- an outdoor table
- two outdoor chairs

How did this happen?! I'd generally consider myself a minimalist but I've got a ton of crap. I'm thinking I'll likely keep my bed, as sleeping in a hammock full-time is (IMO) only doable when sleeping alone, but I kind of want to ditch everything else. What do you all do for furniture? Is going furniture-free ( #furniture-free) a thing?
